casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 24, 2007

[Cite as 12/24/2007 Case Announcements, 2007-Ohio-6906.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2000-1030. Ohio Hosp. Assn. v. Armstrong World Industries, Inc.

Cuyahoga App. No. 76067. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County. On April 13, 2001, this court stayed further proceedings in this case and ordered appellee to file a notice with this court upon the termination of the automatic stay under the Bankruptcy Code.

It is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that appellee W.R. Grace & Son & Co.-Conn. file a notice advising this court of the status of the bankruptcy case within 15 days of the date of this entry.
